author: Jeff Geerling
description:
...but most people would never know.

The two posts referenced in this video:

  - Primary time scale failure: https://groups.google.com/a/list.nist.gov/g/internet-time-service/c/o0dDDcr1a8I
  - Update on Internet Time Services: https://groups.google.com/a/list.nist.gov/g/internet-time-service/c/OHOO_1OYjLY

Also check out the status of all NIST Internet Time Servers: https://tf.nist.gov/tf-cgi/servers.cgi

Thumbnail photos were adapted from Wikipedia Commons / US Government Public domain images:

  - https://www.nist.gov/pml/time-and-frequency-division/time-and-frequency-metrology-and-distribution
  - https://www.nist.gov/topics/physics/optical-frequency-combs
